page.title: 03Stoke Park Survey -results 2
page.content:
HOLIDAYS -types of holidays taken: 14% of the respondents took no holiday at all. Of the remainder some took more than one holiday per year. 95 families had at least one holiday in the U.K. in hotels, guest houses or caravans. 34 families usually had a foreign holiday, 39 took day trips and 33 families stayed with friends or relatives.
HOMELIFE -households consisted of: Adult male 174 Adult female 185 Children 326 Pets: Fish 300 Cat 49 Rabbit 46 Dog 44 Bird 27 Hamster 15 No pets 15
MEALS NOT PREPARED AT HOME -per month Take away 299 Restaurant 115 Nil 24
